Name: PLB
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
MUDDLE lemon in base of shaker and then pour into serving glass.
TOP with tonic water and briefly stir.
Review: Long and refreshing with a tart lemony bite.
History: Created in 2015 by Philip Duff for Pallini Limoncello, the initials which comprise this cocktails name are an acronym of Pallini Lemon Bitters.
